name: Dialogue App
short_description:
Dialogue App produces ideas that are valuable and actionable through structured
online discussion.
long_description:
Dialogue App is designed to make it easy to run a successful dialogue process,
to achieve outcomes like policy crowdsourcing, ideas generation, and
participatory budgeting. A key aspect of designing for success is the approach
to user roles in the app. Dialogue App provides for: Unregisted users Registered
users Moderators Site admins Here's a quick guide to each of the different types
of user in Dialogue App, their responsibilities, and how they interact with the
system.
